price: Ancak iman edenler ve salih amel yapanlar, birbirlerine hakkı ve sabrı tavsiye edenler müstesna.
arabic: إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ وَتَوَاصَوۡاْ بِٱلۡحَقِّ وَتَوَاصَوۡاْ بِٱلصَّبۡرِ

version.title: Turkish translation - Shaaban Britsh
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Shaaban Britsh. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: illā alladhīna āmanū waʿamilū al-ṣāliḥāti watawāṣaw bil-ḥaqi watawāṣaw bil-ṣabri
